PowerDescription.DefEnergy2: Restore energy every turn. The restoration increases at low HP.\n\nRequires Vigor.
PowerDescription.DefInfection2: Infection duration is reduced by 2 (instead of 1) every turn.\n\nRequires Immunity.
PowerDescription.DefHP1: Restore 1 HP every turn when your current HP is less than 5.
PowerDescription.DefHP2: Restore 1 HP when you kill an enemy.\n\nRequires First Aid.
PowerDescription.AttEnergy1: Your target loses energy, which increases with your damage, when being hit.
PowerDescription.AttInfection1: Your attack has a greater chance to cause infection.

Help.Title: Key Bindings\n\n(Refer to manual.txt for more information.)
Help.Normal:
[ hjklyubn | Num pad | Arrow keys ] -- Move in eight directions.
[ . | Num pad 5 ] -- Wait 1 turn.
[ Space ] -- Confirm.
[ Esc ] -- Exit or cancel.
Help.Examine: [ x ] -- Enter Examine mode.\n[ o | d | PgDn] -- Lock next NPC in view.\n[ i | s | PgUp] -- Lock previous NPC in view.
Help.Menu:
[ c ] -- Open menu to buy powers.
[ v ] -- Open menu to view log.
[ / | ? ] -- Open menu to view help.
[ Tab | Shift + Tab ] -- Switch between menus.
